thread.title: This Badass Device For Shotgunning Beers Leaves A ‘Wolverine’ Claw In Your Beer Can
thread.title_full: This Badass Device For Shotgunning Beers Leaves A ‘Wolverine’ Claw In Your Beer Can

author: Brandon Wenerd
title: This Badass Device For Shotgunning Beers Leaves A ‘Wolverine’ Claw In Your Beer Can

organizations.name: badass device for shotgunning beers leaves a ‘wolverine

text:
There are all sorts of novelty devices out there for shotgunning a beer. The Raging Mammoth is probably one of the most infamous ones, but it’s about to have some heavy competition from The Wolverine . The brainchild of a few dudes from Vancouver, this wonderful bro-vention leaves a “perfect claw mark in your beer can” as such:

There’s only a couple hours left to grab it on Kickstarter . Meanwhile, peep how badass this thing is. Definitely a must-have accessory for all Bros this outdoor party season:
